import os
import random
import cv2
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.75aff480:
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    print(dirname)
source.787b3744:
img = cv2.imread(os.path.join('/kaggle/input/few-shot-object-detection/train/images', random_file))

f = open(os.path.join('/kaggle/input/few-shot-object-detection/train/labels', random_file.replace("jpg", "txt")))
for line in f:
    x1, y1, x2, y2 = line.split()
    cv2.rectangle(img, (int(x1),int(y1)), (int(x2),int(y2)), (255,0,0), 4)
source.c1c6aff2:
df = pd.DataFrame(columns=["Id", "Expected"])

predictions = get_predictions_for_image(img)

list_item = []
for i in range(len(predictions)):
    x1, y1, x2, y2, confidence = predictions[i]
    list_item.append([x1, y1, x2, y2, confidence])
df.loc[len(df)] = [filename, sorted(list_item)]
